title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 141.1 - Establishment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 141.1 - Establishment

State Regulations
A board of education, a board of cooperative educational
services, or a vocational education and extension board may, with the approval
of the commissioner, establish and maintain an occupational education program
so that all persons will have access to occupational training or retraining. Boards of education operating an occupational education program shall appoint
an advisory council as provided in section
4601
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
141.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
